body.p: IAS 36 includes requirements for the allocation of an impairment loss for a cash‑generating unit that differ from the proposals in E55. In particular, E55 proposed that an impairment loss should be allocated:

li.p: secondly, to intangible assets for which no active market exists;
thirdly, to assets whose net selling price is less than their carrying amount; and
then, to the other assets of the unit on a pro‑rata basis based on the carrying amount of each asset in the unit.
